wideshayen gammiris genwimath samaga merata gammiras sandaha nisi milak nolabima, merata gammiris wideshiya gammiris sagama mishrakara nithiwirodhiwa apanayanaya kirima, ee thulin merata gammiris sandaha athi thathwaya pahatha watima, ee hethuwen merata gammiris gowithana kada watima athulu gammiris gowiya muhunadena gatalu gananawak sambandhayen sakachcha kirima sandaha prathamika karmantha amathya daya gamage mahatha samaga heta (17) paswaru 2.00ta prathamika karmantha amathyanshayedi sakachchawaka pawathwimata niyamitha bawa samastha lanka gowijana sammelanaye jathika sanwidhayaka namal karunarathna mahatha pawasayi.

uthuru palath sabha manthrini aanandi sasitharan malesiya eelam samuluwe katholika sabhawa dekada kirimata mannarama radaguru uthsaha karayi palanayath, hamuda iwath kirimath saha thrastha panathada ahosi kala yuthu yayi wigneshwaran thamil naduwedi pawasayi koslande wipathata pathwuwan galawa ganimata hamudawa yedawima waraddak yayi kajendran pawasayi hitapu koti thrastha kanthawakwu uthuru palath sabha manthrini aanandi sasitharan pasugiya sanduda katunayaka guwan thotupalata paminiye malesiyawe sitaya.

aapahu wahana hadanawa kiyala thawath kompaniyak patan gaththa eekath dan wahana ekalas kirima karamin innawa .mekath kar karmantha shalawak danawa kiyala me karanne.lankawata wahana aanayana karapu pudgalayek me wokswagan niyojithaya me genwana wahana tika lankawata genalla ekalas karanna sudanam wenawa kiyala thamayi danenne.thawa tika dawasak yanakota balaganna puluwan ara latek eka wechcha dema me wokswagan ekatath weyi kiyana adahasa thamayi thiyenne mehema karmantha patan gaththoth.
